title: Subdomain Takeover on proxies.sifchain.finance pointing to vercel

profile.name: Sifchain
profile.about: The world's first omni-chain decentralized exchange

vulnerability_information:
Hello Team,

Subdomain takeover vulnerabilities occur when a subdomain (subdomain.example.com) is pointing to a service (e.g. GitHub pages, Heroku, etc.) that has been removed or deleted. This allows an attacker to set up a page on the service that was being used and point their page to that subdomain. For example, if subdomain.example.com was pointing to a GitHub page and the user decided to delete their GitHub page, an attacker can now create a GitHub page, add a CNAME file containing subdomain.example.com, and claim subdomain.example.com.
Here there is a Sifchain domain  (proxies.sifchain.finance) which is pointing towards vercel pages so  this domain can be taken over can can be used to do any type of attacks mostly i can make a fake login page on your behalf and spoof your users, this is a critical vulnerability and needs to be fixed .

{F1627827}

Vulnerable url : https://proxies.sifchain.finance/

{F1627821}

Cname: cname.vercel-dns.com
Name: proxies.sifchain.finance
Type: CNAME
Class: IN

## Steps To Reproduce/Concept:

1. Visit https://vercel.com/login and login with dev sifchain account

2. Check the availability of the proxies.sifchain.finance sub domain at https://vercel.com/[YourUsername]/sveltekit/settings/domains

3. The proxies.sifchain.finance sub domain does not exist. Potential to be claimed by others

## Remediation:
Remove the cname entry or claim the subdomain proxies.sifchain.finance on vercel.com

## References:
https://github.com/EdOverflow/can-i-take-over-xyz/issues/183

{F1627822}
{F1627826}

https://github.com/EdOverflow/can-i-take-over-xyz
https://labs.detectify.com/2014/10/21/hostile-subdomain-takeover-using-herokugithubdesk-more/
https://0xpatrik.com/subdomain-takeover/
http://yassineaboukir.com/blog/neglected-dns-records-exploited-to-takeover-subdomains/

Best Regards,
@hrdfrdh

## Impact

Fake website
Malicious code injection
Users tricking
Company impersonation
This issue can have really huge impact on the companies reputation someone could post malicious content on the compromised site and then your users will think it's official but it's not

activities.message:
According to one of the subsequent comments, this doesn't happen anymore if you have a valid higher level domain owned:

>Summary for 2021:
>U can takeover mashed.potato.com only if potato.com is not used in the account of the victim, otherwise, u will get Already owned err.

I also tried it out and got the following error screenshot, so without more info, I don't believe this is a valid problem.

Hi @khdegraaf,

Wait a moment, I'll try takeover. And if there are problems, I will try to bypass or find bugs in Vercel if possible.

Regards,
@hrdfrdh

Hello @khdegraaf,

I want to provide the progress of the test results that I have done. At first I thought vercel had a bug like freshdesk, but it didn't.

You can watch it at [Freshdesk Subdomain Takeover PoC due to Response Manipulation] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eph0PaccRP0 Created by @nagli

But I found something interesting. I found dex2.sifchain.finance could potentially lead to a subdomain takeover. According to the test results it works, but when I want to claim dex2.sifchain.finance there is a problem about authorization

{F1630584}

{F1630583}

Here's a reference video that I did when the website displays DEPLOYMENT_NOT_FOUND. I tried creating 2 accounts then deleting the first account and then adding it in the second account, and it worked on takeover. It's just that when trying to get to the sifchain sub domain there is a problem, maybe this can be researched further so that the subdomain can be taken over.

{F1630596}

Sub domain:
https://proxies.sifchain.finance/
https://dex2.sifchain.finance/

> Wait a moment, I'll try takeover. And if there are problems, I will try to bypass or find bugs in Vercel if possible.

I've tried to takeover, but it didn't work. But in my opinion this has the potential to take over subdomains it just requires further testing or maybe bypass vercel. It is recommended that if the subdomain above is not used (404), it would be better if Cname Vercel is removed because the impact that might occur in my opinion is quite serious. Because I don't want to reduce my reputation, signal and fail to do a takeover, I will N/A this report.

Best Regards,
@hrdfrdh
I am going to close this as Informative.
So thank you for your investigation.

Hi @khdegraaf & Team

Thank you for the bounty

Regards,
@hrdfrdh
